power.title: Acid Mire
power.fluff: You transform the ground beneath your enemies' feet to hellish slime that eats away at flesh and bone

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Intelligence vs. Fortitude

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 3d6 + Intelligence modifier acid damage.

section.name: Critical:
section.text: The target is slowed until the end of your next turn.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Half damage.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The burst creates a zone of caustic slime that lasts until the end of your next turn.
The zone is difficult terrain for all creatures.

A creature that enters the zone or starts its turn there takes acid damage equal to your Constitution modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus. This increases by +5 if the creature is prone. A creature can take this damage only once per turn.

A creature that falls prone in the zone takes acid damage equal to 2 + your Constitution modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus. A creature also takes this damage if it is prone in the zone when it is pushed, pulled, or slid. A creature can take this damage only once per turn.

section.name: Sustain Minor:
section.text: The zone persists until the end of your next turn.

power.title: Bigby's Icy Grasp
power.fluff: You conjure a giant floating hand made of chiseled ice that clutches a foe and freezes it

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You conjure a 5-foot-tall hand of ice in an unoccupied square within range. The hand occupies its square and lasts until the end of your next turn.
When the hand appears, it immediately makes the Icy Clutch attack. While the hand remains, you can use the Icy Clutch attack at-will, using the hand as the point of origin.

section.name: Move Action:
section.text: You move the hand up to 6 squares, or up to 2 squares if it is currently grabbing a creature. For each square you move the hand, you slide the grabbed creature 1 square to a square adjacent to the hand.

section.name: Free Action:
section.text: The hand releases a creature is it currently grabbing.

section.name: Sustain Minor:
section.text: The hand persists until the end of your next turn.
If the hand is currently grabbing a creature, that creature takes cold damage equal to 5 + your Constitution modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus.

section.name: Attack:
section.target: one creature adjacent to the hand
section.text: Intelligence vs. Reflex
If the hand is currently grabbing a creature, you must attack that creature and the attack is against Fortitude instead

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2d8 + Intelligence modifier cold damage, and the hand grabs the target (until escape).
The hand uses your Reflex, or your Fortitude +2 if the target attempts to escape.

power.title: Fire Mantle
power.fluff: You wreathe yourself or an ally in protective fire, which punishes nearby foes

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You activate an Aura 1 (Arcane, Fire, Implement) on the target that lasts until the end of the encounter. The target can also dismiss the aura as a minor action. Enemies adjacent to the target when you use this power count as entering the aura.

An enemy that enters the aura or ends its turn there takes fire damage equal to 2 + your Intelligence modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus. A creature can take this damage only once per turn.
Until the aura ends, the target has partial concealment and resist 10 fire.

power.title: Fireball
power.fluff: A globe of orange flame coalesces in your hand and when you hurl it at your enemies, it explodes on impact

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Intelligence vs. Reflex
If you use this power as a burst 2 within 10 squares, you gain a +2 bonus to all attack rolls, and combat advantage against a creature in the center square

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 4d6 + Intelligence modifier fire damage.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Half damage.

power.title: Foe to Frog
power.fluff: A billowing green fog surround your foe, and when the fog dissipates, your enemy is gone, in its place standing a minuscule creature such as a frog, a new, or a mouse

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Intelligence vs. Fortitude

section.name: Hit:
section.text: The target turns into a Tiny beast of your choosing (save ends). All of the target's equipment transforms with it.
While it remains a beast, the target is dazed, and the only actions it can take are to move up to half its speed or to step.
If the target takes damage from any source, it can immediately attempt a saving throw to end this effect.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: The target turns into a Tiny beast of your choosing until the end of its next turn.

power.title: Glitterdust
power.fluff: You call forth a flash of brilliant light that leaves golden dust that sparkles with supernatural luster on all nearby creatures

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Intelligence vs. Reflex

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2d8 + Intelligence modifier radiant damage, and the target is blinded until the end of your next turn.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Half damage, and the target takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls and Perception until the end of your next turn.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Each target is covered in glittery dust (save ends).
While covered, a target gains no benefit from concealment or invisibility, nor can it become hidden.
Each time the target takes radiant damage, it takes a cumulative -1 penalty to its next saving throw against this effect.

power.title: Grasp of the Grave
power.fluff: Skeletal hands burst from the earth and ghostly claws swirl from the air to snatch at your foes

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Intelligence vs. Reflex

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2d6 + Intelligence modifier necrotic damage, and the target is dazed until the end of your next turn.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Half damage.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The burst creates a zone of grasping hands and claws that lasts until the end of the encounter.
An enemy that enters the zone or ends its turn there takes necrotic damage equal to 2 + your Wisdom modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus. An enemy can take this damage only once per turn.
While the zone remains, you can use the Gravely Grasp attack at-will, using any square in the zone as the point of origin.

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: An enemy either falls prone in the zone, or both starts and ends its turn in the zone

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The target is immobilized (save ends). If the target is prone, it must roll twice and use the lower result when saving against this effect.

power.title: Ice Knife
power.fluff: Hurling a blade of ice against your foe causes the ice to explode into jagged shards that tear through anything they hit

section.name: Primary Attack:
section.text: Intelligence vs. Reflex

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2d6 + Intelligence modifier cold damage, and the primary target is immobilized (save ends).

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Half damage, and the target is slowed (save ends).

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You make the Secondary Attack.

section.name: Secondary Attack:
section.range: burst 2 centered on the primary target
section.text: Intelligence vs. Fortitude

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1d6 + Intelligence modifier cold damage, and the target is numb from cold (save ends).
While numb, the target takes a -2 penalty to AC and Reflex.

power.title: Phantasmal Assailant
power.fluff: You craft an elaborate image of a deadly assassin whose blade cuts deeply in your foe

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Intelligence vs. Will

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 3d8 + Intelligence modifier psychic damage.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Half damage.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The target is fighting off a phantasmal assailant (save ends).
While fighting the assailant, the target takes ongoing 5 psychic damage, grants combat advantage for all ranged attacks against its AC or Reflex, and counts as being flanked for all melee attacks.

power.title: Savage Transformation
power.fluff: You warp your enemy's form, changing it into a monster covered with coarse fur or scales, the flmaes of savagery burning in its eyes

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Intelligence vs. Fortitude

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2d10 + Intelligence modifier damage, and you partially transform the target's mind and body into that of a savage monster (save ends).
While transformed, the target must make an reactive strike whenever a creature triggers one from it.

When any creature ends its turn adjacent to the transformed target, the target uses a free reaction to deal damage to it equal to 5 + your Constitution modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus. If the target's melee basic attack has a damage type, it deals damage of the same type.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Half damage, and you partially transform the target's mind and body into that of a savage monster until the end of its next turn.

power.title: Scattering Shock
power.fluff: Mystical forces draw your foes together as they are struck by a blast of lightning

section.name: Primary Attack:
section.text: Intelligence vs. Fortitude

section.name: Evocation Specialization:
section.text: You can choose to automatically hit the allies you chose after finishing an extended rest

section.name: Hit:
section.text: You slide the target 2 squares.
You can wait to see which targets you hit, and then slide each target in the order you choose.

section.name: Secondary Attack:
section.target: one creature in the original burst, and each creature adjacent to it
section.text: Intelligence vs. Reflex

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 3d6 + Intelligence modifier lightning damage.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Half damage.

power.title: Stinking Cloud
power.fluff: You call forth a thick cloud of bilious yellow vapors whose foul fumes overwhelm any creature within

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Intelligence vs. Fortitude

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2d6 + Intelligence modifier poison damage.

section.name: Critical:
section.text: The target is slowed (save ends).

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Half damage.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The burst creates a zone of foul fumes that lasts until the end of your next turn.

The zone is heavily obscured, and any creature that enters the zone or starts its turn there takes poison damage equal to 5 + your Constitution modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus. A creature can take this damage only once per turn.

section.name: Move Action:
section.text: You move the zone up to 6 squares.

section.name: Sustain Minor:
section.text: The zone persists untilt the end of your next turn.

power.title: Summon Abyssal Maw
power.fluff: The air is filled with the sound of gnashing teeth as a voracious creature of the Elemental Chaos appears and chews into anything it can reach

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You summon a Medium abyssal maw in an unoccupied space within range.
The abyssal maw remains until the end of the encounter, or until you take a minor action to dismiss it.
If the abyssal maw is reduced to 0 hit points or less, it disappears and you lose a healing surge.

power.title: Summon Imp
power.fluff: With a crack and a flash of blood-red light, a tiny winged devil appears, scorpion-like tail held ready

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You summon a Small imp in an unoccupied space within range.
The imp remains until the end of the encounter, or until you take a minor action to dismiss it.
If the imp is reduced to 0 hit points or less, it disappears and you lose a healing surge.

power.title: Summon Magma Beast
power.fluff: Erupting into being with a blast of searing heat comes a magma beast, eager to incinerate your foes

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You summon a Medium magma beast in an unoccupied space within range.
The magma beast remains until the end of the encounter, or until you take a minor action to dismiss it.
If the magma beast is reduced to 0 hit points or less, it disappears and you lose a healing surge.

power.title: Summon Shadow Beast
power.fluff: Shadows swirl and coalesce to form a quasi-real monstrosity that bears the features of various creatures

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You summon a Medium shadow beast in an unoccupied space within range.
The shadow beast remains until the end of the encounter, or until you take a minor action to dismiss it.
If the shadow beast is reduced to 0 hit points or less, it disappears and you lose a healing surge.

power.title: Summon Skeletal Warrior
power.fluff: You call forth shadow stuff and the bones of the dead, forming a skeletal warrior that can become a serious threat to those who don't take it seriously

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You summon a skeletal warrior in an unoccupied space within range.
The skeletal warrior remains until the end of the encounter, or until you take a minor action to dismiss it.
If the skeletal warrior is reduced to 0 hit points or less, it disappears and you lose a healing surge.

power.title: Tasha's Forcible Conscription
power.fluff: By digging deep into an enemy's mind, you unleash crippling pain that causes it to lash out blindly

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Intelligence vs. Will

section.name: Hit:
section.text: The target is stunned until the start of your next turn. This effect also ends if the target is is hit by an attack.

section.name: Aftereffect:
section.text: The target makes a basic attack against a target of your choice as a free reaction. If your attack was a critical hit, the target has a +4 bonus to its attack roll.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: The target is dazed until the start of your next turn. This effect also ends if the target is hit by an attack.

power.title: Thunderstaff
power.fluff: As your enemy comes too close, you slam the butt of your staff into the ground, sending a shockwave that knocks it off its feet and far away from you

section.name: Requirement:
section.text: You must be wielding a staff.

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: An enemy moves to within 2 squares of you

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Intelligence vs. Fortitude

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2d8 + Intelligence modifier thunder damage, and the target is deafened until the start of its next turn.

section.name: Critical:
section.text: The target loses the rest of its actions this turn, and cannot take opportunity actions before the start of its next turn.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Half damage, and the target is deafened until the end of its current turn.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You push the target 5 squares.

power.title: Visions of Avarice
power.fluff: The illusion of fabulous treasure appears out of thin air, causing your enemies to throw aside caution to seize it

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Before resolving the attack, you create zone of illusory treasures in the center square and squares adjacent to it until the end of your next turn.
When an enemy ends a movement in the zone, it must succeed in a saving throw or become immobilized (save ends).

section.name: Sustain Minor:
section.text: The zone persists until the end of your next turn, and you make the Pull of Greed attack, using the zone's center square as the point of origin.

section.name: Target:
section.text: Each enemy in the burst

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Intelligence vs. Will

section.name: Hit:
section.text: You pull the target 4 squares towards the center square. If the target ends this forced movement in the zone, it is immobilized (save ends).

section.name: Miss:
section.text: You pull the target half the distance towards the center square.

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Intelligence vs. Will

section.name: Hit:
section.text: You pull the target 4 squares.

section.name: Critical:
section.text: If the target ends this forced movement in the zone, it is immobilized (save ends).

power.title: Web
power.fluff: You create a giant web of thick magical strands that hangs in midair, trapping those within

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Intelligence vs. Reflex

section.name: Hit:
section.text: The target is immobilized (save ends).

section.name: Miss:
section.text: The target is slowed (save ends).

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The burst creates a zone of magical webbing until the end of the encounter.
The zone is difficult terrain, and any creature that ends a movement in the zone is immobilized (save ends).
